topic.title: there should be a way to search for discussions in zerotalk
topic.body: there seems to be no way to search for discussions in zerotalk. It should be possible.

topic.title: Play should also have search by actor names.
topic.body: Play doesn't have have search by actor names.  It would be nice if that was possible.

topic.title: how to talk to webmasters of site ?
topic.body: How do I talk to the webmaster - The site doesn't tell me anything, for e.g. 'Play' site.

1_1Mxv7my8HRBiVNRtiFaHrrbb11hmPqa6qL.body: I tried and failed and hence had to use id@zeroid.bit because it asks to use bitmessage and it isn't at all clear how to send bitmessage.  Also the e-mail address can't be used conventionally so you are tied to zeromail which again will need a userid so all in all, it's a loop.
